about_the_game: Get your recordings ready for Hollywood with the Movie Wizard and the included animated movie templates. Choose your favorites from a variety of styles and categories, such as vacation, party or New Year's Eve. Each of the 30 movie templates include placeholders for your videos, photos and texts, which you can use to customize your movie.
